messages.message:
PRs older than 7 days will have a “You have 7 days remaining!” modal appear in the Cypress tests, which is causing Cypress tests to fail. Should we hide this modal on Cypress runs, or somehow give extra long trial periods for Cypress users?

(Ideally, we land PRs within 7 days. This issue tends to appear on larger PRs which require multiple eyes + comments, and the workaround of creating a new PR to “reset” the counter loses that history unfortunately)
ah this is why mine are failing probably
this is called out in https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_YIkXbxu7NE9FD5SQlJs5qj114LD-6yK__-qMA3sWis/edit?pli=1&tab=t.0#heading=h.1jpiq21iqmg since it always occurs for PRs older than 7 days
for now, the resolution is to ask Xindi to extend the license for your PR’s org
